background: Comprehensive serverless payment webhook processing system using Terraform. Implementation includes multi-tenant architecture with Lambda functions, API Gateway, DynamoDB, SQS, Step Functions, S3, ECR, VPC networking, and EventBridge for event-driven architecture. Features include fraud detection, intelligent data archiving, point-in-time recovery, VPC endpoints for private access, comprehensive logging, monitoring, and cost optimization with ARM64 architecture. Complete test suite with 159 unit tests and 49 integration tests.
author: koushik-turing
